r4pde 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Sliding Window Analysis for Time-Series Data

    windowpane.Rd

    This function performs a sliding window analysis over a given data frame for the specified variable. It calculates the mean, sum, or count above a given threshold for the variable values in each window. The window size and direction are defined by the user-specified window lengths and direction.

    Usage

    windowpane(
  data,
  end_date,
  variable,
  summary_type,
  threshold = NULL,
  window_lengths,
  direction = "backward"
)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame that contains the data for analysis. It must include a YYYYMMDD date column.

    end_date

    A character string that specifies the end date for the analysis in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

    variable

    The name of the variable in the data frame on which to perform the analysis.

    summary_type

    The type of summary statistic to compute for each window. Can be 'mean', 'sum', or 'above_threshold'.

    threshold

    An optional numerical value. If summary_type is 'above_threshold', the function counts how many variable values in each window are above this threshold.

    window_lengths

    A numerical vector that specifies the lengths of the windows for the analysis.

    direction

    A character string that specifies the direction of the sliding window. Can be 'backward' or 'forward'. The 'backward' option calculates windows moving from the end_date backward, while the 'forward' option calculates windows moving from the earliest date forward.

    Value

    A data frame in wide format where each column corresponds to a window of a certain length and start day, containing the calculated summary statistic for that window. The column names are in the format 'variable_startday_endday'.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
data <- tibble(YYYYMMDD = seq(as.Date("2023-01-01"), as.Date("2023-12-31"), by = "day"),
               variable = rnorm(365))
windowpane(data, "2023-12-31", variable, "mean", NULL, c(7, 14, 21), direction = "backward")
windowpane(data, "2023-01-01", variable, "sum", NULL, c(7, 14), direction = "forward")
}
